column2: group_by(date_f, primary_fur_color) %>% # this group_by adds primary_fur_color vs. the prior one
summarise(count_of_squirrels = n()) %>% # so count is by fur color and date
aes(x = date_f, y = count_of_squirrels, color = primary_fur_color) +
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'date_f'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
